'''Strange Part''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from various sources.

==How to Obtain== 
# Complete [[World Quest]]s in [[Merusea Village]]:
#* [[A Brush of Seafoam and Crimson]]
#* [["Hey, This Isn't Pumpkin Soup..."]]
#* [[Book of Esoteric Revelations]]
#* [[Echoes of the Ancient World]]
#* [[Fishing Game]]
#* [[The Lone Phantom Sail]]
#* [[Strange Stone Chronicle (Part 2)]]
#* [[The Three Primary Colors of the Solar Corona]]
# Complete [[Cosanzeana]]'s request from the {{Quest|There Will Come Soft Rains}}
# Open specific chests in [[Elynas]]
# Interact with [[Serene]]:
#* After finishing ''[[A Brush of Seafoam and Crimson]]''
#* After finishing ''[[Blue Longing of Heart and Moon]]''

==Usage==
Four Strange Parts are required to repair [[Seymour]] in ''There Will Come Soft Rains''.

Strange Parts can also be exchanged for items with [[Xana]].
